commands.name: List All Nodes
commands.description: View all nodes in the cluster

commands.name: View Pods Distribution
commands.description: See which nodes are running which pods

commands.name: Cordon a Node
commands.description: Mark node as unschedulable (prevents new pods)

commands.name: Drain the Node
commands.description: Safely evict all pods from the node

commands.name: Watch Pod Migration
commands.description: Observe pods being rescheduled (Ctrl+C to stop)

commands.name: Verify Final State
commands.command: kubectl get nodes && kubectl get pods -n k8s-multi-demo
commands.description: Confirm cluster is back to normal
